org.com.essex.ec910.artificialstockmarket.market

Class ArtificialMarket

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.com.essex.ec910.artificialstockmarket.market.ArtificialMarket

  • public class ArtificialMarket
extends java.lang.Object
    Main Class of the model. Describes and implements an artificial stock market where agents can trade on. Therefore a version of the auction based trading system used by XETRA and SETS was implemented. The price finding mechanism is execution volume maximizing. Overall two different Order types (market and limit order) are supported. For further information please see related course work.
    Author:
    Jonathan Doering

      • getLastNPrice

        public java.lang.Integer[] getLastNPrice(int n)
        Returns the last n prices as an Array of integer in order is [t, t-1, t-2, .. , t-n]. If n is grater then the price list, the whole price list will be returned.
        Parameters:
        n - - number of prices
        Returns:
        array of integer with last n prices or null if list is empty

        public double[] getLastNPriceAsDoubles(int n)

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        array of Doubles with last n prices or null if list is empty
